descriptionHtml:
Install : Extract the zip files to \\data folder, and check the fireaice.esp at the launcher Menu

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Ice & fire sword spell at the start of the game automatically will be obtained.
Spell has the power tab
click Voice button to cast
cast ice magic as  Voice button 10 seconds
Are displayed on-screen effects 10 seconds after
click voice button in the During the 20 frames 
cast Finish Fire magic

ice magic : Enemy Damage <30> (to player 1 point health damage)

fire magic : Enemy Damage <200> (to player 10 point health damage and  50 points stamina damage )

5 seconds, the internal cooldown
After the cooldown on the upper-left corner of the screen
 \"Ice & fire sword magic charge O.K\" Marked 

The music does not come when you cast magic.
author: Kgorillia
